production: Set production mode to true when you are ready to go live.
help: Set help to true or false to toggle help

menuBgOnScroll.target: The element that is being targeted to have the background changed. Ex the navbar section '#navbar'
menuBgOnScroll.triggerElement: The element relative to which the change will trigger. Ex the masthead section '#masthead'
menuBgOnScroll.className: Optional, change the name of the class that will be triggered. Dedault  'nav-scrolled'
